TextView.android:text: Select the unit you want to move. The white highlighted squares show the squares the unit can move to. Select a destination and the route will be shown.
Tap again on the destination to move the unit.

Select the unit you want to attack with. The red highlighted squares show the units you can attack from the current position. Select a unit to attack to bring up the combat analysis. This screen shows the probability of the attack succeeding - see the help section titled 'Combat' for more information. If you're happy with your chances, tap the 'Attack' button.
Some units can transport others. To board a unit, simply move it onto the square occupied by the other unit.
NOTE: Units being transported can't engage in combat.
